item.title: 土耳其西姆塞克称里拉过度上涨将带来风险
item.description: 财政和金融部副部长穆罕默德-西姆塞克（Mehmet Simsek）说，如果土耳其央行没有购买美元来增加储备，土耳其里拉就会升值。【原文：Turkey’s lira would have appreciated had the central bank not been buying dollars to build up its reserves, Treasury and Finance Mehmet Simsek said, adding that steep currency gains would bring risks amid increased foreign demand for lira assets.】

item.title: 英国央行布罗德本特称英国今夏可能降息
item.description: 英国央行副行长本-布罗德本特（Ben Broadbent）表示，只要经济数据继续按照官员们的预期发展，英国就有可能在今年夏天降息。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Ben Broadbent said UK interest rates may be cut this summer so long as economic data continues to evolve as officials expect.】

item.title: 千禧年觊觎花旗集团规模的大宗商品收益，但不是风险
item.description:
世界上薪酬最高的对冲基金经理希望建立一个世界领先的大宗商品业务。内部人士称，伊兹-英格兰德并不总是给他的团队提供所需的跑道。【原文：

The world’s best-paid hedge fund manager wants to build a world-beating commodities business. Insiders say Izzy Englander doesn’t always give his team the runway it needs.

】

item.title: Archegos 风险主管向华尔街撒谎。现在他是明星证人
item.description: 比尔-黄（Bill Hwang）欺诈和操纵市场案的陪审员已经听到证人说，Archegos 资本管理公司对其华尔街交易对手撒了谎。本周，他们将听取主要说谎者之一的证词。【原文：Jurors at Bill Hwang’s fraud and market manipulation trial have already heard witnesses say that Archegos Capital Management lied to its Wall Street counterparties. This week they will hear from one of the main liars.】

item.title: 阿布扎比因大量资金管理者涌入，资产管理规模激增 211
item.description: 阿布扎比报告称，其金融中心管理的资产激增，因为资金经理们纷纷涌入该酋长国，提升了其作为有影响力的金融中心的形象。【原文：Abu Dhabi reported a surge in assets under management within its financial center as money managers rushed to the emirate, bolstering its image as an influential financial hub.】

item.title: 即使首次公开募股寥寥无几，伦敦仍是欧洲股票销售之都
item.description: 伦敦仍然是欧洲上市公司股票销售的首选之地，因为近期大量的二级市场交易使英国首次公开发行股票的不足黯然失色。【原文：London remains Europe’s top venue for sales of shares in listed companies, as a recent raft of secondary deals eclipses a lack of UK initial public offerings.】

item.title: 据说 Ceva Santé Animale 正在酝酿以 70 亿欧元的价值进行融资
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国动物保健公司Ceva Santé Animale正处于与顾问合作进行新一轮融资的初步阶段。【原文：French animal health firm Ceva Santé Animale is in the preliminary stages of working with advisers on a new fundraising round, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南议会选举陈清文为新主席
item.description: 越南国会周一下午宣布，选举陈清文（Tran Thanh Man）为新一届国会主席，任期至 2026 年。【原文：Vietnam’s National Assembly elected Tran Thanh Man to be its new chairman for a term ending in 2026, the legislature said Monday afternoon.】

item.title: 股东阻挠瑞典卡诺夫公司收购行动后收购升温
item.description: 代表 Karnov Group AB 至少 12% 股份的所有者公开拒绝了对这家瑞典法律和会计集团的收购，称每股 84 克朗（7.86 美元）的报价过低。【原文：Owners representing at least 12% of the stock in Karnov Group AB have publicly rejected a takeover approach for the Swedish legal and accounting group, saying an offer of 84 kronor ($7.86) per share is too low.】

item.title: 日本制造商最希望日本央行保持外汇稳定
item.description: 日本央行的一项大型企业调查显示，与追求稳定的通货膨胀和经济增长相比，日本制造商更希望看到日本央行把稳定货币市场作为货币政策的重点。【原文：Japanese manufacturers would prefer to see the Bank of Japan prioritize stable currency markets as a bigger monetary policy focus than the pursuit of stable inflation and economic growth, according to a major corporate survey by the central bank.】

item.title: 2023 年肯尼亚经济因天气原因增长 5.6%，增速为两年来最快
item.description: 在农业部门复苏的推动下，肯尼亚经济以两年来最快的速度增长，与政府自己的估计相符。【原文：Kenya’s economy accelerated at its fastest pace in two years in line with the government’s own estimate, powered by a recovery in the agricultural sector.】

item.title: 债券买家多年来在新兴市场公司债券风险方面获得的报酬最少
item.description: 投资者离开安全的美国国债，去承担新兴市场公司债券的风险，得到的补偿是六年来最少的。【原文：Investors are getting the least compensation in six years for leaving the safety of US Treasuries and taking on the risk of emerging-market corporate bonds.】

item.title: 中国 4 月资本外流飙升至 2016 年以来最高水平
item.description: 中国 4 月份的资本外流加剧，凸显了人民币在国内经济疲软和美联储加息路径不确定的情况下所面临的不利因素。【原文：China’s capital outflows worsened in April, underscoring headwinds for the yuan amid a weak domestic economy and uncertainties over the Federal Reserve’s rate trajectory.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司修复南非炼油厂的交易进入可行性阶段
item.description: 南非国家石油公司（PetroSA）表示，南非国有石油公司与俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom Group）旗下的一个部门就重振其位于南非南海岸莫塞尔湾的天然气液化炼油厂达成的协议已进入可行性研究阶段。【原文：A deal between South Africa’s state-owned oil company and a unit of Russia’s Gazprom Group to revive its gas-to-liquids refinery in Mossel Bay on the nation’s south coast has moved into the feasibility stage, PetroSA said.】

item.title: 了解多战略 "Pod Shop "的内部运作
item.description: 多策略对冲基金现在风头正劲。但对于它们的具体业务，以及所谓的 "pod shops "与更传统的对冲基金有何不同，人们也有很多困惑。在本期播客中，我们采访了该领域的资深人士 Giuseppe 'Gappy' Paleologo。除了撰写有关量化金融的书籍外，Gappy 还曾担任 Citadel 风险和量化分析总监、千禧年企业风险主管等职务。【原文：Multi-strategy hedge funds are all the rage right now. But there's also a lot of confusion about what exactly they do, and how the the so-called "pod shops" differ from more traditional hedge funds. On this episode of the podcast, we speak with Giuseppe 'Gappy' Paleologo, a long-time veteran of the space. In addition to writing books about quantitative finance, Gappy was formerly the director of risk and quantitative analysis at Citadel and the head of enterprise risk at Millennium, among many o】

item.title: 南非英普拉茨公司完成 5 亿美元黑人投资者交易
item.description: 安派拉铂金控股有限公司（Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd.）宣布了一项价值 90 亿兰特（约合 5 亿美元）的交易，黑人投资者将持有这家南非矿业公司及其去年收购的巴福肯（Bafokeng）业务 13% 的股份。【原文：Impala Platinum Holdings Ltd. announced a 9 billion rand ($500 million) deal that will result in Black investors holding a 13% interest in the South African mining company and the Bafokeng business it acquired last year.】

item.title: 刺探日本黑帮头目凸显原子走私威胁
item.description: 今年，当美国检察官指控一名日本黑帮分子密谋向伊朗将军贩运核武器材料时，他们揭露了一个阴暗的国际网络的一个环节，而这个网络一直困扰着安全官员。【原文：When US prosecutors charged a Japanese mobster this year with conspiring to traffic nuclear-weapons material to an Iranian general, they exposed one piece of a shadowy international network that continues to preoccupy security officials.】

item.title: 空中客车公司获得沙特阿拉伯旗舰航空公司历史性订单
item.description: 随着沙特阿拉伯王国投入数十亿美元将该国打造成航空和旅游中心，空中客车公司获得了沙特阿拉伯旗舰航空公司105架窄体喷气式飞机的订单。【原文：Airbus SE secured an order for 105 of its narrowbody jets from Saudi Arabia’s flagship carrier as the kingdom pours billions of dollars into turning the country into an aviation and tourism hub.】

item.description: 华尔街最著名的熊市分析师之一刚刚转而看好美股前景。【原文：One of Wall Street’s most prominent bears has just turned positive on the outlook for US stocks.】

item.title: 钻探结束，油轮返回希腊湾转运俄罗斯石油
item.description: 当地海军在希腊南部海域的演习结束后，至少有七艘油轮返回希腊南部海域，继续转运俄罗斯石油货物。【原文：At least seven oil tankers returned to waters off southern Greece to resume switching Russian petroleum cargoes after drills in the area by local navy came to an end.】

item.description: 欧洲银行和制药巨头推动欧洲第一季度盈利超出预期，预示着未来可能会上调指导。【原文：Europe’s banks and pharmaceutical giants propelled European earnings ahead of expectations in the first quarter, signaling potential guidance upgrades ahead.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克警告 6 月后不要仓促降息
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克认为，欧洲央行的降息步伐必须与欧元区通胀的逐步放缓相匹配。【原文：The pace of European Central Bank interest-rate cuts must match the gradual slowdown of euro-area inflation, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 中国监管机构本周将与欧洲基金会面以重振股市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国市场监管机构计划于本周在欧洲与投资者会面，这是中国政府为增强投资者对世界第二大股票市场的兴趣而采取的更广泛举措的一部分。【原文：China’s markets regulators plan to meet with investors in Europe this week, according to people familiar with the matter, part of a broader move by authorities to shore up interest in the world’s second-largest stock market.】

item.title: 英国地产公司以 3.6 亿英镑出售 Meadowhall 购物中心股权
item.description: 英国置地公司（British Land Co.）已将其在谢菲尔德梅多尔购物中心（英国最大的购物中心之一）的股份出售给挪威主权财富基金。【原文：British Land Co. has sold its stake in Sheffield’s Meadowhall Shopping Centre, one of the largest shopping malls in the UK, to Norway’s sovereign wealth fund.】

item.title: 报告称，日本富人到 2030 年将增加投资 1.4 万亿美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的一项分析显示，随着现金流充裕的家庭在市场上进行更多的投资，到本十年末，日本巨富将促使他们投资的资产价值激增 30% 以上。【原文：Mega-wealthy Japanese will contribute to a more than 30% surge in the value of assets they invest by the end of the decade as cash-heavy households deploy more in markets, according to an analysis by Morgan Stanley.】
